price: Onlar, cimrilik eder ve insanlara da cimriliği emrederler Kim yüz çevirirse şüphesiz Allah zengindir, hamde layık olan O’dur.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَبۡخَلُونَ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلۡبُخۡلِۗ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yabkhalūna wayamurūna al-nāsa bil-bukh'li waman yatawalla fa-inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
